abstract: This week, Rich Ricci, the head of Barclays investment banking unit, is entering several horses in the Cheltenham Festival, including “Fat Cat in the Hat.”
snippet: This week, Rich Ricci, the head of Barclays investment banking unit, is entering several horses in the Cheltenham Festival, including “Fat Cat in the Hat.”
lead_paragraph: President Obama irked Wall Street bankers a few years ago by calling them “fat cats.” But one banker has embraced the name.

headline.main: A Barclays Banker Bets on a ‘Fat Cat’
